Module NewsManager
Package application

Class ArticleEditModel

java.lang.Object
application.ArticleEditModel
class ArticleEditModel extends Object
This class is used to represent an article when it is editing This class is needed to develop ArticleEditController
Author:
√ÅngelLucas

  • Property Details

    • abstractText

      StringProperty abstractTextProperty
      This method provide access to edited article abstract property. So, this abstract can be modified through this property
      See Also:

      This method provide access to edited article body property. So, this body can be modified through this property

  • Field Details

    • original

      private Article original
      Reference to original article. Useful for undo changes

    • edited

      private Article edited
      Reference to modified article

    • bModified

      private boolean bModified
      It is a flag used to indicate that exists updates for the article - False: unmodified - True: modified

  • Constructor Details

    • ArticleEditModel

      ArticleEditModel(Article org)
      Construct an ArticleModel instance from an existing article
      Parameters:
      org - article attached to edit model

      ArticleEditModel(User usr)
      Construct an ArticleModel instance with a new empty article that belong to user
      Parameters:
      usr - user who creates the new article

  • Method Details

    • abstractTextProperty

      StringProperty abstractTextProperty()
      This method provide access to edited article abstract property. So, this abstract can be modified through this property
      See Also:
      • getAbstractText()

    • addedChangeListener

      private void addedChangeListener()
      This method adds a change listener to all article properties in order to know whenever there is a change on edited article

    • bodyTextProperty

      StringProperty bodyTextProperty()
      This method provide access to edited article body property. So, this body can be modified through this property

    • commit

      public void commit()
      Consolidates changes permanently. Changes can't be undone Copy article data from the edited one to the original

    • discardChanges

      public void discardChanges()
      Discard all changes. Changes will be lost Copy article data from the original one to the edited

    • getAbstractText

      public String getAbstractText()
      This method provide a copy of edited article abstract
      Returns:
      a copy of edited article abstract

    • getArticleOriginal

      Article getArticleOriginal()
      This method give access to the original article
      Returns:
      the original article if only if has a valid title

    • getBodyText

      String getBodyText()
      This method provide a copy of article body text
      Returns:
      a copy of edited article body

    • getCategory

      public Categories getCategory()
      This method give access to the edited article category
      Returns:
      category from the edited article

      public String getSubtitle()
      This method provide a copy of edited article subtitle
